1.content: First off, choose the giant baby.
1.title: So it begins

choices: He puts people in his diaper
11.content: It was just a normal day in South Dakota, when a 1600-foot-tall 2-year-old boy wearing only a glowing golden diaper appeared near Mt. Rushmore!
11.title: Boy

choices: Peed and pooped on the city
111.content: The enormous baby boy headed to the nearest city, and began crushing buildings, cars, and people beneath his enormous feet. Next, he sat down and crushed dozens of buildings beneath his padded butt. Then he grabbed some buildings and devoured them like candy. Next, he....
111.title: He attacks a town

12.content:
Molly, a 600-foot-tall 1-year-old girl, had just escaped from a crystalline prison beneath California, and she was heading for Sacramento.

Now what was this colossal cutie about to do?
12.title: Girl

122.content: "You meanies made me stay in a prison and now you will be in a prison of your own" Molly said as she began to grab cars and people and throwing them in her diaper. No one could escape and she threw the whole city of Sacramento into her diaper. "Now get ready for the punishement" she said as she...
122.title: Put people in her diaper

choices: put more people in her diaper
1221.content: Pooped her diaper. She giggles as she continued stinking up her diaper as the people got buried in her mess. Now in a poopy diaper Molly decides to...
1221.title: pooped the diaper

choices: by destroying the city with her poopy diaper
12211.content: Put more people in her diaper. Molly managed to put about 900 people in the back of her poopy diaper. Molly simply giggled as her tummy gurgled. Molly knew what she had planned for the people in her diaper as she got into a squatting position. She let out a long fart that blew down several buildings as she started pooping. Molly"s diaper bulged out greatly as she buried the citizens of Sacramento. Her diaper was now very full. Molly grinned at the sight of her poopy diaper. And decided to have some fun
12211.title: poop again

122111.content: what city she goes to
122111.title: in another city

1222.content: Molly peed her diaper and drowned many of the trapped people. Next she....
1222.title: peed the diaper

12223.content:
"Its time for babies to rule the world" molly said as she raised her hands.
Then suddenly babies began to grow taller and taller ranging from 50 feet to 400 feet tall.
Next
12223.title: Made more babies her size

choices: Follow Nephew Wolf A.K.A Super Tyke.
122231.content:
Meanwhile all across the country and the world as well, giant babies who were now taller and fatter than ever before as their size and weight ranged from at least being 50 feet to 400 feet tall while they were terrorizing entire global cities by either wrecking or devouring them.

But one baby in particular who appears in this story along with his Uncle Big Bad Wolf courtesy of Warner Bros. Animation in other words Nephew Wolf A.K.A Super Tyke was about to find out firsthand what it would be like as a giant baby, as he would also transform into his heroic alter ego Super Tyke in other words the tyke of steel.

(Nephew Wolf A.K.A Super Tyke's point of view)

To begin with, I was but a mild mannered normal sized tyke who wore nothing but a white baggy diaper with yellow straps on it as my Uncle Big Bad Wolf was caring for me until one fateful day it happened.

That day my Uncle and I were outside our home until suddenly I started growing larger and fatter than ever before while I was transforming into my heroic alter ego until my growth spurt stopped at 150 feet tall as I now had a Superman costume with a t on the shield instead of an s on it.

"N-n-n-nephew are you alright?!" My uncle called to me while looking upward at yours truly.

"Indeed I'm alright, wait a minute I can speak English like anyone else? Huh I wonder if i have any other superpowers that I don't know about." I said.

Soon enough I decided to try flying around which was easier said than done as I soon landed back on the ground.

"Now that I at least know what superpowers I have, it's time to stop those giant rampaging babies as this looks like a job for Super Tyke." I heroically said as I flew off into the distance while my uncle could only watch.

"Be careful nephew and come back home soon." My uncle said while becoming choked up.

Meanwhile....
122231.title: More baby attacks

choices: Put people, cars, and buildings in his diaper
13.content: Jack was a 900-foot-tall 3-year-old boy who had just risen up out of Upper New York Bay wearing just a red swim diaper. Jack was thrilled to be bigger than all these adults for a change. He decided to....
13.title: Boy Option 2

131.content: Jack wadded ashore and began crushing boats that were docked in the harbor. Then he stepped up onto the land and began stomping tiny cars and people and crushing buildings beneath his massive diaper. Next he grabbed an airliner out of the sky and threw it, smashing several buildings. Then he....
131.title: Destroy things

135.content:
Austin is 2500-foot-tall 2-year-old boy with black hair and blue eyes who wears a white diaper covered with pictures of storm clouds. In addition to his massive size, Austin can actually control the weather, and he loves to use this ability in playful ways.

Want to use him?
135.title: Different baby please

1352.content:
Asuko is a 200ft Japanese baby that is somehow infused with giant monster DNA. For of all, he grows to that heights but is able to roar like a giant monster, and can shoot fire from his mouth. Many of humanity's weapons is no match against him, and how knows what other powers that he has. He is a kaiju, so he rampages like a giant monster. His diaper has giant monster characters on it.

So, want to use him?
1352.title: Asuko The Kaiju Baby

13521.content: Asuko rose up out of Tokyo Bay and let out a mighty roar. He stomped into the city, cracking the pavement beneath his huge feet. He crushed cars and people beneath his huge feet and set buildings alight with his fire breath. After rampaging for a while, he....
13521.title: Kaiju Baby

choices: Continue - Max is 80 feet tall but not for long -
13522.content:
Max was a little over. 2 1/2 years old.
He was your typical toddler with blonde hair
and blue eyes.


He’s curious and playful can talk a little and
had started potty training not long ago.
He has no clue what happened to him
and no real concept or understanding of size.


All was normal for Max until one day his
babysitters made a huge mistake quite
literally.


Now Max keeps having random growth spurts
and there seems to be no way to stop it and no
telling if or when the spurts will stop.


One thing is for sure.
Messing around during Max’s bath time
to make a bigger Max went further than
Ryan or Kelly imagined and now they had created
Mega Max the growing toddler!
13522.title: Different Baby Please

choices: Terrorize all of downtown Los Angeles.
135224.content:
Long ago in a state far far away mainly the state of California, yours truly a big completely fat baby boy known as the incredible growing baby was on the loose in Los Angeles.

One beautiful sunny day in Los Angeles, I the incredible growing baby had hungrily eyed a fast food restaurant in other words Five Guys that was hosting an event as they were giving away free burgers and fries as I began to heavily waddle towards my destination.

Meanwhile over at the Five Guys fast food restaurant everyone was having the time of lives and having fun as well, until the ground itself started rumbling as the sound of giant footsteps approaching the fast food restaurant could be heard as my shadow then towered over everyone as I stood there as I said a few words.

"Peekaboo I'm the incredible growing baby as I'll eat all of these delicious yet yummy burgers and fries, as I the incredible growing baby will eat everything in sight as I'll also get bigger and fatter as well." I said.

Immediately the crowd who was at the event started fleeing in terror as I then hungrily eyed all those burgers and fries that I could eat as I heavily waddled over to where the burgers and fries were at as I then sat my big completely fat incredible growing baby butt down on the ground with a thud that shook rattled and rolled the entire area I was in.

"Ooh goody there's lots of burgers and fries for me to eat, as I the incredible growing baby know it's chow time." I said.

I then started gobbling all of those burgers and fries as my size and weight increased as I was now larger than the Five Guys restaurant itself.

"Can you beat that I'm larger than a building mainly this Five Guys fast food restaurant that I invaded. Now what will I do next?" I asked myself.
135224.title: Another baby or character

1353.content:
Why not a baby known as Omni? Omni is a baby (a male one) that can control all of reality himself, and can simply do anything. He can breath fire if we wants, grow to planet size to destroy planets with a simple Earth shattering roar? He can even use his own powers to make a universe where giant babies take the role of giant monsters. He can do so much. He is also so big that he is given his god like powers.

So, what shall it be?
1353.title: Omni Baby

choices: She grows bigger and makes the whole state her playground
14.content:
Emily was an 1800-foot-tall 2-year-old girl who had just appeared mysteriously in the middle of Arizona. She had blonde hair and blue eyes and wore a white diaper with pictures of bunnies on it.

What happens next?
14.title: Girl Option 2

145.content:
It was a beautiful day just outside New York City. A two year old girl named Susan was playing with her dolls in her front yard. Since it was the middle of summer, she was wearing a pink shirt along with her white shoes and diaper. All of a sudden she felt a tingling in her tummy. As she grabbed her stomach, she started to grow. She giggled as she watched everything start to get smaller. After a few seconds, her shirt and shoes started ripping. Soon enough they ripped apart completely. Her diaper was growing with her. By now her diaper was pushed up against the walls of her house. The walls groaned as she grew against them until they collapsed. Soon enough the house had been turned to rubble beneath her diaper. After a minute of growth she was 200 feet tall and had destroyed another two houses beneath her diaper.

She giggled as she looked around her. People began gathering in the street when they heard the commotion. To Susan, she was surrounded by new dolls and doll houses. She reached forward and grabbed several people. "Yay, new dowllies!" Her captives began panicking and the others began running. "Save in diapa." Susan opened up the front waistband of her diaper and deposited the little people inside. She giggled at the tickling inside her diaper. She stood up and started walking after the other citizens running.

She left massive footprints as she stomped after them. She started scooping more people up and shoving them into her diaper. Once she had a couple dozen people she decided to play with them. She started crawling down the street looking for a suitable house to play with. She found a nice two story house with a nursery upstairs. She sat down, miraculously killing nobody, and ripped off the roof. She deposited the people inside. Then she grabbed a couple packages of diapers from the nursery, and the diapers grew to fit her “dolls”. One by one she changed all the people into a baby diaper. Some of them were put down for a nap, some were watching TV, Susan was playing with some of them and the other were playing with other toys.

One of them started crying and Susan picked him up to ask what was wrong. She found out when she saw his diaper sag. "Does baby need diapa change?" She lay the man down on the changing table. She quickly changed his diaper and put him back to play with the others. For hours she played with the toys and changed their diapers. Then a loud growl came from her belly. She smiled at the little people and they started panicking. The front blocked by her diaper, the sides were blocked by her legs, the only way out was the back. Susan noticed this and put her hands on the walls. It collapsed into rubble and they were trapped.

She smiled at them and yelled, “You look yummy”. She picked up a panicked women and lifted her up. This women begged for Susan to let her go. She offered to do anything, even change her diaper. Susan was just set on having her little snack. She opened up her mouth and tossed the screaming women inside. Susan smiled and let out a loud mmm as she sucked on and rolled the women around in her mouth. When the taste was gone, Susan tilted her head back and gulped the women whole. The people screamed as they watched a bulge form and slide down her throat. You awe yummy she yelled. She started shoving the people into her mouth and swallowing them. When it was all over, all of them were squirming in her tummy. After a few minutes, the people had been turned to mush and nutrients. Susan let out a loud burp, shattering nearby windows and giggled.

She got a fun idea. She stood up and turned around so her diaper was right above the house. She sat down with a loud boom and crunch as the house was crushed beneath her diaper. “House crunchy beneath diapa”, she yelled. She stood up and started walking down the street again. This time she started stomping on houses. These small houses didn’t offer any resistance to her giant feet. At one house she stomped down on the house. The occupant was running right as it came down, and Susan felt the person crunch beneath her foot. She was curious what happened and started stepping on other people. She was giggling at the crunchy feeling of killing them. She went full on Godzilla and started stomping on everything in sight. After a while most of the town was destroyed and she was tired. She noticed that only a few houses were still standing. She walked over and sat down, crushing several beneath her diaper. Then she lay down, crushing any building that was left. She smiled and fell asleep, eager to continue her playing tomorrow.
145.title: Different baby please

choices: Susan grew bigger than the One World Trade Center
Susan climbed up the One World Trade Center
1451.content: When Susan woke up the next morning, she immediately began rampaging! First, she charged through the city, smashing through buildings and crushing people and cars. Then, she started sitting on buildings and crushing them with her diapered butt. While she was rampaging, she suddenly felt the same feeling in her tummy that she felt when she first grew, and began growing again, stopping at 500 feet tall. "Yay, I'm bigger!" said Susan gleefully. The now even bigger toddler girl began rampaging more, smashing more buildings and crushing more people and vehicles. By noon, all of New York City was destroyed except for its tallest building: the One World Trade Center. Susan was upset that this building was still so much taller than her.
1451.title: New York rampage

14511.content:
Suddenly, Susan once again felt the familiar tingling sensation in her belly, and began growing again, this time stopping at 2000 feet tall. "Yes, now I'm bigger than this building!" Susan said triumphantly. Susan immediately smashed through the One World Trade Center just like she had all of the other buildings in the city.

What happened next?
14511.title: Susan grew bigger than the One World Trade Center

choices: Susan used her diaper and found another city to change her
Susan decided to take over the world
Susan made more toddlers her size
145112.content: Susan walked to another city, her enormous feet shaking the ground as she walked. When she got to the new city, she somehow knew that being gigantic wasn't her only new power. With a playful roar, Susan fired a beam of atomic energy from her mouth, vaporizing a huge swath of the city. Then, she raised her hands to the sky and summoned a tornado that began destroying more of the city. When half of the city was destroyed, Susan dismissed the tornado and began stomping across the remaining half of the city. When the whole city was destroyed, she began growing yet again, stopping at a mile tall! In addition to growing bigger, she also gained the wings and tail of a dragon.
145112.title: Susan went to another city

choices: Start over with a different baby girl ( because more ops weren’t given )
14513.content:
By noon, all of New York City was destroyed except for its tallest building: the One World Trade Center. Susan was upset that this building was still so much taller than her.

Choice chapter
What next?
14513.title: Your choice

1452.content:
As the sun rose the next day, Susan began to wake up. When she opened up her eyes, smoke was rising all around her. She sat up and looked at the destruction around. She just smiled and giggled as she thought back to the fun she had the previous day. Then she noticed New York City was nearby and would be the perfect toy.

She stood up and let rubble fall off her white diaper. She patted her diaper and yelled out, “Twoys squish be diapa”. She stomped through the rubble towards the city. The people had watched as she rampaged her home town earlier. They started panicking when they saw this playful toddler walking towards them.

Susan walked into the city and smiled at the panicking little “bugs”. She stomped after the people running. When she caught up to them, she reached down and scooped up several of her toys in her pudgy fingers. She smiled at them, and with her free hand, opened up her diaper. These people started screaming as they realized what she wanted. She dropped them inside and giggled at their squirming. She kept doing this until she had dozens inside.

Then a loud growl echoed throughout the city. At first she thought it was a jet, but then felt pressure building in her bladder. She smiled and turned to a building that reached up to her knees. She ripped off the roof and saw many people inside. They just stared at the smiling face of a giant toddler, but then started screaming as they saw her diaper coming towards them. She rested her butt on the building and opened up her diaper. She started peeing and giggling as her captives were trying to swim in it. Soon they all drowned and Susan just giggled. Then she started pushing on her bowels and released a massive fart. This sent the people inside flying into the diaper and people outside into the wall. She pushed a log into her diaper, causing it to sag. She pushed several more logs into the diaper, killing all the toys inside. The people in the building were pinned by her sagging diaper. Then the building started cracking and collapsed into rubble. Susan giggled as she fell and then there was a crunch as her diaper toys were squished. “Diapa squish twoys and biwlding” She looked at a few nearby toys, and yelled out “You change diapa.”

These people screamed and started running away. Susan started to get upset and stomped her foot down with a loud boom. “Stop wunning now and change me”. The people just kept running desperately and Susan started stomping after them. They turned a corner and saw the road was blocked by rubble. Then Susan turned the corner and trapped them. “Now me punish you” she yelled and the people started begging to let them change her. She just turned around and sat down, squishing several people beneath the full diaper. “Bwuggies squish” she said giggling. She lifted her butt up and yelled out “bwugs meet diapa” and she sat down again killing even more. She kept doing this until all the people were turned into pancakes by her white diaper. “You shoulda changed diapa.” She saw a couple more people nearby and told them to change her or meet the same fate as she patted her diaper.

These people gulped in fear but agreed. Susan found a supermarket nearby, ripped off the roof and grabbed a white diaper, wipes and powder. They grew to her size and she put them down in the street. Then she lay down, crushing several buildings. She giggled and told the people to get to work. They unfolded the clean diaper and slid it beneath her. Then they climbed up her legs and undid the Velcro and the weight brought it down to the ground. The smell was overwhelming, but they just muddled through. They used the old diaper to clean her up as best they could. They finished cleaning her up with some wipes and put them into the old diaper. They folded the diaper in half and slid it out from beneath her. They sprinkled on the baby powder and rubbed it so she wouldn’t get a rash. They climbed up her legs again to pull the diaper up and Velcro it on tight.

When it was all done, Susan sat up and smiled at the little people. She looked over her diaper and smiled. “Good job bwuggies, now into diaper.” She wrapped her legs around them and they were trapped. The people screamed as she started stuffing them all into the white diaper. Once it was done 100+ people were just toys squirming in a toddler’s diaper. She picked up her full diaper and carried to the dump. She sat down and dropped the diaper inside. She looked around the city wondering what to do next.
1452.title: New Yorkers Change Diaper

15.content:
Okay, it is now time to create more giant babies in one group, hence the name multiple babies. So, the first two is y'all making babies that are original characters, the other two is predetermined with the Rugrats and Muppet Babies so that they are some diversity in the cast, and well the last option is the option to continue for more options.

Seriously folks, select one already.
15.title: Multiple giant babies

choices: Heathcliff  Boom Boom and Bart the bunny.
151.content:
Okay here's some original multiple babies to choose from.

Heathcliff Boom Boom and Bart the bunny happen to be mini giant babies who end up growing bigger and fatter whenever they eat or drink anything. Soon these mini giant babies won't be so mini anymore when they grow to a giant size and become fat giant babies.
151.title: Original multiple babies (1)

152.content: Sally and Molly are both two year old toddlers who are in fact twins. Both with red hair and green eyes. Both are monster movie lovers at a young age, watching King King, Godzilla, and variousmithers,,and even imitates then. They wear a two piece pink swimsuit with a Godzilla tail attached, with a diaper underneath it. One day some aliens came in and captured the girls, and soon they return them 200ft tall, with minds of giant monsters. Things won’t Look good for any city in their path.
152.title: The Kaiju Twins

info.brief_description: Yet another story of giant babies unleashed upon the world.
info.description:
Once again, a giant baby or babies is unleashed upon the world.

-The minimum height for the giant baby or babies is 200 feet tall, and they can be any size bigger than that
-No blood, gore, sex, or swearing
-The giant baby or babies can't die, but they can be captured or shrunken down
-Other than that, GO NUTS!
